intro: Withania kweichouensis, commonly known as the Kweichou nightshade, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Solanaceae family, which includes tomatoes, potatoes, and tobacco. The plant is characterized by its small, bell-shaped flowers and yellowish-green berries. It thrives in temperate climates and is often found in forested areas. Due to its unique botanical features, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists.
